docs.lead_paragraph: LEAD: AS the society has become more health, weight and diet conscious, Americans, particularly children, have become fatter. This seeming paradox has its roots in environmental factors, among them easy access to high-calorie foods; the additional time spent watching television, which can lead to the consumption of foods advertised on television, and reductions in school physical education programs.
